monogr.title: Drum Beats: Walt Whitman's Civil War Boy Lovers

bibl.author: John J. Barker
bibl.title: John J. Barker to Walt Whitman, 19 June 1863
bibl.orgName: The Walt Whitman Collection, Harry Ransom Humanities Research Center, The University of Texas at Austin

body.p: i resevdreceived your leterletter this morning an was very glad to here from you iI am driven a team for the regmentregiment iI have every faverFavor iI ask. iI go wharewhere iI pleasplease and when iI pleasplease CaptenCaptain saissays he will do all in his power to get meeme in as a recrutenrecruiting officer if iI get that iI will be just wharewhere iI want to beebe Carter is the Col he is all the man that hoaldhold the same command that they first held tharthere has bin a change in all the officers in the regmentregiment lutennentLieutenant Col meltenMelton is in command of the regmentregiment Col Carter is often brgider genralgeneral genralgeneral Carter is ctin magermajor general wee think they will be promoted Capten Skaggs did may the 19 at stan-foardStanford by A Psenter that was ordleyorderly sargentsergeant of Co E is now CaptanCaptain he is Jest like a privet and as study as a Jug JC sebrig is fist lutenentlieutenant B B Jones is a lutenentlieutenant brother williamWilliam is ordlyorderly

I hvehave got sound an well an as stout as ever iI have binbeen at home twice since iI roatwrote to you iI cudentcouldn't stay long for the rebels pickets was in site just acrousacross the river an our pickets on this side iI wish you could be with meeme iI have moarmore fun than a litellittle iI am singelsingle all a long the road from mill springs to stanfoardStanford wharewhere iI make a trip ever 7 or 8 days iI go in two miles of hoamhome when iI go to millsprings our boys are all in good sirrets and egger to fight since rot to you weewe went acrousacross the river an had skermisskermish of about 4 ours an drivdrive the bacback seven miles weewe returned in good order our losloss was 6 kildkilled an 30 wound Capten Carrens morrtlymortally I but is geten beter lutenen will Coff wounded 5 companyscompanies of our regmetregiment is at millsprings an 5 here they will return today they 70 prisnersprisoners yesterdyesterday give my big respcrespect to all inquireninquiring friends tell mis isralIsrael an mis low howdy for me mamy god blesbless you good by
